Summary: Two lights, changing colors from white to green to blue danced far away. There was no sound
divs: Sighting DetailsLights danced right at dusk. Changed direction very abruptly. Event lasted for 30-45 minutes. Video was taken over the top of a nearby house toward the city of Wilmington, NC from Wrightsville beach.
trends: There have been 96 other sightings in Wilmington
There was one other sighting in Wilmington on or around April 17th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
